Vadim MoM (4.3.25): 
Spoke to Vadim (QA) we spoke about several technical topics but he also wanted to discuss his salary.

1. he is currently getting 400,000 RUB
2. when he first came he expected to get 700,000
3. he wants to have a raise (he was very polite)
4. I offered a bonus program where we can reward him by performance - he agreed but said he would still like to have his base salary raised to 500,000 Rub

# Active Projects and maintenance 

## Development projects

- PayFlow CRM  (Stas)
- Treasury order router (Garantex)
- Garantex middleware (integration)
- Cashflow (Irina Akopyan)
- Veksel Track (Irina Akopyan)
- Party application (socapp)
- Party microsegmentation dashboard (Map)
- Secure a7a5.io stablecoin app
- Secure Eximint customer CRM (need to rebuild)
- Secure phones Development 
- 1C accounting server maintenance
- Linphone development (starting this month - April)

## Maintenance and infrastructure

#### Backup and high availability for all servers

#### VPN servers (32 vpn servers)

#### Socapp servers. (100 servers - growing to 200 this month)

#### email servers (domain,ssl,) and web servers (65 domains)

#### File servers for ALL files
    - Krilatskaya File server
    - A7 File server
    - Kyrgizie File server
    - globalaviation.consulting File server
    - eximint.ru File server

#### Calendar servers
    - Management Calendar server
    - anykey.pro Calendar server

#### Communication
    - 3 mattermost servers (management,A7,party)
    - PBX
    - ScaleFusion Phone security management

#### Cloud monitoring project (24/7)

#### Jitsi Video conferencing maintenance

@vic regarding the datacenters:
1. please find a suitable location in St. Petersburg for the DR
2. lets create a business plan and budget for building an HA datacenter

## costs should include:
1. minimum 3 internet providers joined by BGP
2. 100 different ip subnets (class C or bigger)
3. redundant networking equipment: Routers, Switches, Firewalls,.
4. Faraday cage protected server racks
5. dual electricity source (2 different transformers if possible)
6. Generator + battery based UPS to provide stable electricity to the whole place
7. Servers:
   -  48 cores or more
   - 1U and 3U servers
   - spare equipment: SSD and NVME disks
   - RAM 
   - cables
8. Fire extinguishing equipment
9 . Renovation (floating floors, cabaling etc.)
10. maintenance team (24/7 controllers- minimum 2 in place at any given point in time), security guards (minimum 2 in place at any given point in time)

had a meeting with Leonid and Misha:
1. they will bring the external consultant for 4A to a meeting with me - once they will give me time and date I will ask Sergey to join me - he will be responsible
2. these "external employees" will come to our office in the beginning to review the code:
 - the review will be done with our laptops that we will provide
 - the review will be supervised by our team members
3. if and when we decide - these employees will work on maintaining the 4A app until we convert it to our go lang microservices  and will be PART OF OUR TEAM - but paid by an external company.

Regarding DLP:
- we will not put DLP until we review physical security.
- we will use Bastion and another company they will bring to perform physical and digital pen-testing.
- we will revisit it once these pen tests are done.
- on Tuesday I have a meeting with their security team
